00136         template <typename T> void setParameter(const ParameterMap &parms,
00137                                                 T &parm,
00138                                                 const std::string &key) {
00139             std::cerr<< "Function::SetParameter(";
00140             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parameters.begin();
00141                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00142                 std::cerr << i->second->getName() << ", " << T(*(i->second));
00143                 if (i->second->getName() == key) parm = T(*(i->second));
00144             }
00145             std::cerr << ", " << parm << ", " << key << ") \n";
00146         }

00200 template <typename T> inline
00201         void Function::declareParameter(const std::string &_name,
00202                                         const T &_default) {
00203             parameterNames.push_back(_name);
00204             if (parameters.find(_name) == parameters.end()) {
00205                 insertParameter(
00206                     std::make_pair(_name,
00207                         ParameterFactory::Instance().
00208                             createParameterWithDefault(_name, _default)));
00209             }
00210         }
00211 
00213 template <typename T> inline
00214         void Function::declareParameter(const std::string &_name,
00215                                         const T &_default, const T &_value) {
00216             parameterNames.push_back(_name);
00217             if (parameters.find(_name) == parameters.end()) {
00218                 insertParameter(
00219                     std::make_pair(_name,
00220                         ParameterFactory::Instance().
00221                             createParameterWithDefault(_name, _default)));
00222                 parameters[_name]->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_value));
00223             }
00224         }
